entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait this morning. Wind becoming light this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
